messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually need some help with an order issue. My order was accidentally sent to Texas, but I live in the 32286 zip code area. I don't remember the order number, but I want to know the tracking number for that order. Also, I want to return all items except the pet bed and get a refund to my Amex credit card. Can you assist me with this? It's quite urgent.

messages.content:
To add your Amex credit card as a payment method on our website or app, please follow these steps:

1. Log in to your account on our website or app using your email and password.
2. Navigate to the "Account" or "Profile" section.
3. Look for the "Payment Methods" or "Wallet" option and select it.
4. Click on "Add Payment Method" or a similar button.
5. Choose "Credit Card" as the payment method type.
6. Enter your Amex credit card details, including the card number, expiration date, CVV, and billing address.
7. Save the new payment method.

Once you have added your Amex credit card, please provide me with the payment method ID associated with it, and I will assist you with the refund for your return.

If you encounter any issues or have further questions, feel free to ask!

message.content:

4. Click on "Add Payment Method" or a similar button.
5. Choose "Credit Card" as the payment method type.
6. Enter your Amex credit card details, including the card number, expiration date, CVV, and billing address.

Once you have added your Amex credit card, please provide me with the payment method ID associated with it, and I will assist you with the refund for your return.
